long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find Kaaba direction online without an app. Find out your Kaaba direction line with an online map. So you can easily determine your Qibla direction.

With the help of this plugin you can quickly find your Kaaba direction. The plugin accesses location information and quickly generates the Kaaba direction line for your current location. You will instantly see your Qibla direction on an online map. If you want to find the Qibla direction line for a different location, you will need to enter the latitude and longitude coordinate information from above.
